description.name: description
description.value:
With a simple class I'm unable to obtain a valid wsdl.

Following class and server code
{noformat} 
######################################
 Server class
######################################
<?
class TestServer {
    /**
     * A simple test
     *
     * @param integer $param1
     * @return string
     */
    public function insert($param1) {
        return "Hello ".$param1;
    }
}
{noformat} 

{noformat} 
######################################
 Controller class
######################################

...

public function wsdlAction() {
        $this->_helper->layout->disableLayout();
        $this->_helper->viewRenderer->setNoRender(true);
        
        $this->getResponse()->setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/xml');  
        $wsdl = new Zend_Soap_AutoDiscover();
        $wsdl->setClass('TestServer');  
        $wsdl->handle();  
        exit;  
    }

...
{noformat} 


I obtain this wsdl

{noformat} 
######################################
 WSDL output
######################################


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<definitions xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"
	xmlns:tns="http://localhost/index.php"
	xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"
	xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
	xmlns:soap-enc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"
	name="TestServer" targetNamespace="http://localhost/index.php">
	<portType name="TestServerPort">
		<operation name="insert">
			<input message="tns:insertRequest" />
			<output message="tns:insertResponse" />
		</operation>
	</portType>
	<binding name="TestServerBinding" type="tns:TestServerPort">
		<soap:operation
			soapAction="http://localhost/index.php#insert" />
		<soap:binding style="rpc"
			transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" />
		<operation name="insert">
			<input>
				<soap:body use="encoded"
					encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" />
			</input>
			<output>
				<soap:body use="encoded"
					encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" />
			</output>
		</operation>
	</binding>
	<service name="TestServerService">
		<port name="TestServerPort" binding="tns:TestServerBinding">
			<soap:address location="http://localhost/index.php" />
		</port>
	</service>
	<message name="insertRequest">
		<part name="param1" type="xsd:int" />
	</message>
	<message name="insertResponse">
		<part name="insertReturn" type="xsd:string" />
	</message>
</definitions>
{noformat} 

That give the followings error:
   soap:operation expected but not found for binding "TestServerBinding", operation "insert"

The problem is that 
    <soap:operation
			soapAction="http://localhost/index.php#insert" />
must be inside the 
    <operation name="insert">

{noformat} 
######################################
 WSDL correct code
######################################

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<definitions xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"
	xmlns:tns="http://localhost/index.php"
	xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"
	xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
	xmlns:soap-enc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"
	name="TestServer" targetNamespace="http://localhost/index.php">
	<portType name="TestServerPort">
		<operation name="insert">
			<input message="tns:insertRequest" />
			<output message="tns:insertResponse" />
		</operation>
	</portType>
	<binding name="TestServerBinding" type="tns:TestServerPort">
		<soap:binding style="rpc"
			transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" />
		<operation name="insert">
            <soap:operation
                soapAction="http://localhost/index.php#insert" />
			<input>
				<soap:body use="encoded"
					encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" />
			</input>
			<output>
				<soap:body use="encoded"
					encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" />
			</output>
		</operation>
	</binding>
	<service name="TestServerService">
		<port name="TestServerPort" binding="tns:TestServerBinding">
			<soap:address location="http://localhost/index.php" />
		</port>
	</service>
	<message name="insertRequest">
		<part name="param1" type="xsd:int" />
	</message>
	<message name="insertResponse">
		<part name="insertReturn" type="xsd:string" />
	</message>
</definitions>
{noformat}

value.name: Zend_Soap_Wsdl
value.description: Class for accessing SOAP WSDL documents.

value.body: Changing issues in preparation for the 1.7.0 release.
